<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Calculate missing AWA document size records when instance upgraded from pre-Orlando to post-Orlando</description>
        <name>Calculate missing AWA document size</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var channelGR = new GlideRecord("awa_service_channel");
channelGR.addActiveQuery();
channelGR.query();

while(channelGR.next()) {
  var channelCondition = channelGR.getValue("condition");
  var utilCondition = channelGR.getValue("utilization_condition");
  var tableName = channelGR.getValue("workitem_table");
  var assignedToField = channelGR.getValue("assign_to_field");

  var documentGR = new GlideRecord(tableName);

  if (channelCondition)
    documentGR.addEncodedQuery(channelCondition);

  if (utilCondition)
    documentGR.addEncodedQuery(utilCondition);

  documentGR.query();

  while(documentGR.next()) {
      var documentSizeGR = new GlideRecord("awa_document_size");
      documentSizeGR.addQuery("document_table", tableName);
      documentSizeGR.addQuery("document_id", documentGR.getValue("sys_id"));
      documentSizeGR.query();
      if(!documentSizeGR.next()) {
          if(documentGR.getValue(assignedToField) || hasAssociatedWorkItem(tableName, documentGR.getUniqueValue())) {
            documentSizeGR.setValue("document_table", tableName);
            documentSizeGR.setValue("document_id", documentGR.getUniqueValue());
            documentSizeGR.setValue("service_channel", channelGR.getUniqueValue());
            documentSizeGR.setValue("assigned_to", documentGR.getValue(assignedToField));
            var size = getSize(tableName, documentGR.getUniqueValue());
            documentSizeGR.setValue("size", size);
            documentSizeGR.insert();
          }
      }
  }
}

function hasAssociatedWorkItem(documentTable, documentID) {
  var workItemGR = new GlideRecord("awa_work_item");
  workItemGR.addQuery("document_table", documentTable);
  workItemGR.addQuery("document_id", documentID);
  workItemGR.addActiveQuery();
  workItemGR.query();
  if(workItemGR.next()) {
    return true;
  }
  return false;
}

function getSize(documentTable, documentID) {
  var workItemGR = new GlideRecord("awa_work_item");
  workItemGR.addQuery("document_table", documentTable);
  workItemGR.addQuery("document_id", documentID);
  workItemGR.addActiveQuery();
  workItemGR.query();
  if(workItemGR.next()) {
    var size = workItemGR.getValue("size");
    if(size)
      return size;
    return 1;
  }
  return 1;
}]]></script>
